meanings.definition: The act of making a knit stitch with the yarn held at the front of the work.
meanings.sent1: She practiced her purlings to improve her knitting skills.
meanings.sent2: The scarf had beautiful purlings along the edges.
meanings.sent3: The cat watched the purlings of the river with curiosity.
meanings.sent4: The purlings of conversation weaved through the room.
meanings.sent5: The gentle purlings of the stream were soothing to listen to.

meanings.definition: A series of knit stitches in knitting.
meanings.sent1: The intricate pattern included various purlings.
meanings.sent2: Her sweater had lovely purlings that added texture.
meanings.sent3: The purlings of yarn seemed to dance on the needles.
meanings.sent4: The purlings of stars in the sky created a mesmerizing design.
meanings.sent5: The purlings in the fabric gave it a unique look and feel.

meanings.definition: The sound of water flowing gently.
meanings.sent1: The purlings of the brook could be heard from afar.
meanings.sent2: The peaceful night was filled with the soothing purlings of the stream.
meanings.sent3: The purlings of the fountain made the garden feel magical.
meanings.sent4: The purlings of the waterfall echoed in the valley.
meanings.sent5: The rhythmic purlings of the creek lulled her to sleep.
